description: Try our easy to follow Lamb With Lemon & Olives recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb dishes,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lamb With Lemon & Olives Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g lean lamb, cut into bitesized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Heat the oil in a frying pan, add the onion, and cook over a medium heat for 5 minutes, or until it is beginning to soften. Add the lamb and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes, or until no longer pink. Add the garlic and lemon and cook for 1 minute, then add the rest of the ingredients and cook for a further 2 minutes, stirring well.
Transfer the mixture to a small baking dish, packing it in tightly. Add 2 tablespoons of water, mix well, then bake for 20 minutes.
Remove from the oven and allow to rest for 10 minutes before serving with fresh crusty bread and a crisp green salad.
